sentences.en: "Is that how you got that scar on your face?" Bess asked curiously.
sentences.cn: “那就是你脸上那道伤疤的由来？”贝丝好奇地问道。

sentences.en: a deep cut that could leave a permanent scar
sentences.cn: 可能会留下永久性疤痕的一道很深的伤口

sentences.en: A muscle tear will leave a scar after healing.
sentences.cn: 肌肉撕裂复原后会留下疤痕。

sentences.en: a scar on his cheek
sentences.cn: 脸上的伤疤

sentences.en: A small scar marked her forehead and icicles hung from her brown fur cap.
sentences.cn: 她额上有块小疤痕,棕色的皮帽上挂着冰花.

sentences.en: Haas identified the suspect by the scar on his face.
sentences.cn: 哈斯通过他脸上的伤疤辨认出他是嫌疑犯.

sentences.en: He had a long, curved scar on his right cheek.
sentences.cn: 他的右脸上有一道弯弯的长疤。

sentences.en: Her face was disfigured by a long red scar.
sentences.cn: 她脸上一条红色的长疤使她破相了。

sentences.en: Her mental scars will take time to heal.
sentences.cn: 她的精神创伤需要时间来治愈。

sentences.en: His eyes became sunken and even the scar on his face darkened.
sentences.cn: 他的眼陷下去,连脸上那块疤都有些发暗.

sentences.en: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.cn: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.en: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.cn: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

sentences.en: That scar on your face is a good identification mark.
sentences.cn: 你脸上那块疤是个好记号.

sentences.en: The blowup showed a scar on the attacker's cheek.
sentences.cn: 放大的照片显示出攻击者面颊上有块伤疤.

sentences.en: The cut on his forehead scar red over.
sentences.cn: 他前额上的刀伤结疤痊愈了.

sentences.en: The cut will not leave any scar.
sentences.cn: 这刀口不会留下疤痕.

sentences.en: The early years of fear and the hostility left a deep scar on the young boy.
sentences.cn: 早年的恐惧不安和别人的敌意给这个小男孩留下了深深的创伤。

sentences.en: The tragedy left a scar on her mind.
sentences.cn: 这个悲剧给她造成精神上的创伤.

sentences.en: This scar is from the bite of a dog.
sentences.cn: 这是狗咬后留下的伤疤.

sentences.en: Though the sore being healed, yet a scar may remain.
sentences.cn: 伤口虽然痊愈, 却可能留下伤疤.

words.tran_cn: 在…上划痕；乱划；严厉批评

trans.tran_en: a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

trans.tran_cn: 使结疤，使…破损，给…留下精神创伤
trans.tran_en: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body

trans.tran_cn: 给…留下疤痕；给…留下精神创伤；损害…的外观
trans.tran_en: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
